featured.text: As more people rely on the Internet for information, it has newspapers as the most important source of news.
Newspapers, radio and TV stations, and websites have participated in the April 1 tradition of making 20 reports in order to fool their audiences.

definition.zh_def: 報紙，一種定期出版的印刷媒介，通常包含新聞、評論、廣告和其他信息。
definition.en_def: A newspaper is a regularly published printed medium that typically contains news, articles, advertisements, and other information.
definition.example: I read the newspaper every morning to stay updated on current events.
